sentences.en: And I reaffirm that everyone is worthy － and worth knowing.
sentences.cn: 并且我再次坚信,每个人都是有价值的――值得你去了解.

sentences.en: He had ample opportunity to reaffirm his basic ideological commitment.
sentences.cn: 他曾多次有机会重申他的基本思想信念.

sentences.en: I have come to this country to reaffirm that dedication.
sentences.cn: 我这次到贵国来,就是为了重申这种献身的决心.

sentences.en: I urge you, therefore, to reaffirm your love for him.
sentences.cn: 8所以我劝你们, 要向他显出坚定不移的爱心来.

sentences.en: It is particularly important to reaffirm this point today.
sentences.cn: 今天重申这一点,有特别重要的意义.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, let me reaffirm the great importance I attach to a successful outcome in Iraq.
sentences.cn: 同时, 让我重申在伊拉克取得成功结果的重大意义.

sentences.en: On this International Day of the World's Indigenous Peoples, we reaffirm our commitment to their wellbeing.
sentences.cn: 值此世界土著人民国际日之际, 我们重申关于促进其福祉的承诺.

sentences.en: That's why he constantly had to reaffirm his love for art.
sentences.cn: 那就是为什么他必须不断重复地确定他对艺术的热爱.

sentences.en: The party reaffirmed its commitment to nuclear disarmament.
sentences.cn: 该党重申其核裁军承诺。

sentences.en: The two sides reaffirm the importance of their cooperation on the U.S. - China Electric Vehicles Initiative.
sentences.cn: 双方重申“美中电动汽车倡议”合作的重要性.

sentences.en: Therefore, we should reaffirm that it was correct to struggle against Gao Gang.
sentences.cn: 所以反对高岗的斗争还要肯定.

sentences.en: We must not only reaffirm the need for it but exercise it when necessary.
sentences.cn: 对专政手段,不但要讲,而且必要时要使用.

sentences.en: We reaffirm that exchange rates should reflect economic fundamentals.
sentences.cn: 我们重申,汇率应该反映经济基本面.

sentences.en: Wherefore I urge you to reaffirm your love for him.
sentences.cn: 林后2:8所以我劝你们、要向他显出坚定不移的爱心来.

sentences.en: You also asked if attempts to improve the body reaffirm an attachment to the ego.
sentences.cn: 你还问到努力改善身体是不是重申对小我的认同.
